The Microsoft Partner Network (MPN) is a hub of people, resources, and offerings brought together to give you everything you need to build and deliver successful solutions for your customers. Visit the
questions.question2: to learn more or sign up. Are you currently an MPN member and/or did you visit the link to learn more?
answers: Yes, I’m an MPN member or I visited the link

questions.question: The Microsoft Partner Community (MPC) is the central destination for sharing business best practices with members of the MPN. It’s a shared space where you can build meaningful connections, engage with experts, get answers to questions, and tap into the full power of our partner ecosystem. The US Partner Zone includes important announcements, networking opportunities, business resources, Q&As, virtual events and more. Visit the
questions.question2: to sign up or learn more. Are you currently an MPC member and/or did you visit the link to learn more?
answers: Yes, I’m an MPN member or I visited the link
